statements: SELECT * FROM reports
SELECT report_id, ROI FROM reports WHERE lead_conversion_rate > 0.5
SELECT sales_pipeline FROM reports ORDER BY report_id DESC
SELECT AVG(lead_conversion_rate) AS avg_conversion_rate FROM reports
SELECT report_id, sales_pipeline FROM reports WHERE ROI < 0.1
SELECT * FROM reports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT report_id, sales_pipeline FROM reports WHERE lead_conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT report_id, ROI FROM reports WHERE sales_pipeline LIKE '%sales%';
SELECT AVG(lead_conversion_rate) AS average_conversion_rate FROM reports;
SELECT report_id, sales_pipeline, ROI FROM reports WHERE lead_conversion_rate < 0.3 ORDER BY ROI DESC;
SELECT * FROM lead_conversion_rates;
SELECT lead_id, converted FROM lead_conversion_rates WHERE converted = true;
SELECT deal_name, deal_stage FROM sales_pipeline ORDER BY deal_stage DESC;
SELECT lead_id, converted, conversion_date FROM lead_conversion_rates WHERE converted = false;
SELECT deal_name, deal_amount FROM sales_pipeline WHERE deal_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM lead_conversion_rates;
SELECT lead_id, converted FROM lead_conversion_rates WHERE converted = TRUE;
SELECT deal_id, deal_name, deal_amount FROM sales_pipeline WHERE deal_amount > 5000;
SELECT deal_id, deal_name, deal_stage, expected_close_date FROM sales_pipeline ORDER BY expected_close_date DESC;
SELECT lead_id, converted, conversion_date FROM lead_conversion_rates WHERE conversion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM lead_conversion_rates WHERE lead_id = 1;
SELECT id, conversion_date, conversion_rate FROM lead_conversion_rates WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY conversion_date DESC;
SELECT lead_id, sales_stage, sales_value FROM sales_pipeline WHERE sales_stage = 'Qualified' AND sales_value > 10000 ORDER BY sales_value ASC;
SELECT roi, roi_date FROM roi_analysis WHERE roi > 0.2 AND roi_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, lead_id, conversion_rate, conversion_date FROM lead_conversion_rates WHERE conversion_date <= '2022-05-31';
SELECT * FROM lead_conversion_rates WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY conversion_date DESC
SELECT lead_id, COUNT(*) AS total_conversions FROM lead_conversion_rates GROUP BY lead_id HAVING total_conversions > 1 ORDER BY total_conversions DESC
SELECT lead_id, AVG(conversion_rate) AS avg_conversion_rate FROM lead_conversion_rates GROUP BY lead_id HAVING AVG(conversion_rate) > 0.3 ORDER BY avg_conversion_rate DESC
SELECT lead_id, SUM(sales_value) AS total_sales_value FROM sales_pipeline GROUP BY lead_id HAVING total_sales_value > 10000 ORDER BY total_sales_value DESC
SELECT * FROM roi_analysis WHERE roi > 0.2 ORDER BY roi_date ASC
SELECT * FROM lead_conversion_rates
SELECT lead_id, conversion_status FROM lead_conversion_rates ORDER BY lead_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT lead_source FROM lead_conversion_rates
SELECT conversion_date, lead_source FROM lead_conversion_rates WHERE conversion_status = 'Completed'
SELECT deal_id, deal_value, deal_stage, closing_date FROM sales_pipeline ORDER BY closing_date
SELECT * FROM lead_conversion_rates WHERE lead_id = 1;
SELECT lead_id, conversion_status FROM lead_conversion_rates WHERE conversion_status = 'Qualified';
SELECT * FROM sales_pipeline WHERE deal_stage = 'Negotiation' ORDER BY closing_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, revenue_generated FROM ROI_analysis WHERE ROI > 1.5;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, analyst_name FROM sql_data_analysis WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM lead_conversion;
SELECT lead_name, conversion_status FROM lead_conversion WHERE conversion_status = 'Complete';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_cost, campaign_revenue FROM ROI_data ORDER BY campaign_revenue DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM analyst_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT deal_name, deal_stage, deal_amount FROM sales_pipeline WHERE deal_amount > 10000;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, conversion_status, conversion_date FROM lead_conversion;
SELECT deal_id, deal_name, deal_stage, deal_amount, deal_close_date FROM sales_pipeline;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_cost, revenue, campaign_revenue FROM ROI_data ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date, lead_conversion_rate, sales_pipeline_analysis, ROI_analysis FROM analyst_reports WHERE lead_conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM analyst_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-03-31';
